title: Thunderbird Version 115.2.3
content: I am a POP user using Thunderbird Version 115.2.3. I retrieve the mail headers first, then when I click on a message to see the contents of the actual message Thunderbird skips to the next message. The message I had wanted to read now becomes the previous message. I then have to go back and click on the message to see its contents. Please correct.
creator: attride

title: Thunderbird
content:
Hoe kan ik een pdf uit een mail direct doorsturen naar een andere mail?

How can I forward a pdf from one mail directly to another mail?

Gr. Michael H.F. Jordan

title: gestione identità
content: da qualche mese non riesco ad impostare un profilo nuovo per la gestione identità. avevo già più profili che andavano bene, per cui non capisco il motivo che adesso non vadano più, mi esce il messaggio che il mittente non consentito. potete aiutarmi, grazie
creator: matteo_mazzotti

title: Emails
content:
- Open TB - Open Inbox to see all emails - Open an email, read it, delete it - Scroll down, reading email Subjects until I find another email I want to open (this may be 30-40 lines or more) - Open another email, read it, delete it

The cursor/highlight then jumps back up to the previously highlighted email (next to the first email I deleted). Now I don't know where I am, I don't know what email Subjects I have already looked at, I don't know where the next unlooked-at email is. In order to get back to where I was before I deleted the second email, I have to scroll down through many emails I have already scrolled through.

How do I stop TB from doing this? I want the cursor/highlight to stay right where it was before I delete any email, I do not want it jumping to some previous location.
creator: MilusC1

title: Email message Threading
content:
How do I stop Threading in TB 105? The instructions at <https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/message-threading-thunderbird> do not work.

Milus Campbell

title: Email folders
content: I have a Gmail and Hotmail Account in Thunderbird and relating folders for each account. Since yesterday, all my Gmail folders will also show in my Hotmail folders and vice versa. However the duplicated folders are empty. It seems to have something to do with an offline setting. I recently got a new phone (Android) and was setting up my email accounts there. I was playing around with synchronizing all my emails and I am wondering, if I inadvertently changed some setting that caused the duplications.

title: High power usage and problems receiving emails and opening PDFs
content: Over the last two days (starting just before the latest Thunderbird update) Thunderbird is crashing 3 or 4 times a day, and is intermittently failing to download emails. Opening attachments (e.g. PDFs) to emails can take several minutes, whereas previously it was almost instantaneous. Task Manager shows that Thunderbird's power usage is 'very high'. None of these problems has happened before. I'm running Windows 10 on a PC.
creator: bill318

title: Upgrade to Thunderbird v115 has lost me access to emails/folders/contacts
content:
After the automatic upgrade to 115.2.2, I have lost access to all my folders, emails and calendar entries. But I can still see my addresses by using Tools/Address Book, and my filters by using Tools/Message Filters.

When I started Thunderbird for the first time on 115.2.2 I got to the usual message page which had all the tabs of the "open" emails I had when I last closed Thunderbird. But there was no sign of my folders and I couldn't get to any other messages (See first screenshot). I also had a second occurrence of Thunderbird running (I could have hit the icon a second time) that didn't show the tabs I had on the first screen. (No screen shot)

On a previous post here https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1424153 it was suggested that I try Troubleshoot mode. That made no difference and at that time I had no folders showing, and just two tabs. I suspect after that I deleted the tabs.

Now I get a completely blank page in what is usually the message/folder area. Also the button for the address book above the message pane has now gone disappeared (Second screen shot), and I can find no way of accessing my previous (10years+ of messages).

It looks to me as if something is wrong in the profile.

Where do I go from here?
creator: mara1618

content:
Hi,

Tried to set up the Thunderbird mail app, hotmail account with microsoft authenticator set up, it kept telling me my password was wrong within set up window on Thudnerbird.

Password is 100% correct manually tried on the web and back on the app, same issue, please advise.
creator: JB100

title: Customisation of the card view
content:
Thanks for improving Thunderbird!

I very much like the new card view! However, I am missing the small green unread-button, that I also use to change the status of the mail in the table view. As I use the unread status to sort mails and keep mails up on the list. To quickly change the read status back is part of my way of organising my work. Of course there is a menu and a context menu but all this requires more moves. Can I customise what I can see and interact with on a card?

KR, idi
creator: ydi

title: How to create 2 acounts in Thunderbird with same full name
content: I have been using Thunderbird (now 102.15.0, 64 bit) on Ubuntu Linux for several years now. I have 2 gmx accounts with the same full name (not aliases) introduced when they were created. The parameters (email address, pswd) for these accounts are different, of course. When I want to create IMAP (or POP3) accounts in Thunderbird for the 2nd gmx address, this fails. and I get the message : « unable to login at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password ». This forces me to manage my emails as webmail only, which defeats the main purpose of using Thunderbird, of course (i.e. to manage all emails/accounts on the same page). How can I go around this issue? Do I have to change my full name on the gmx server?
creator: prfndr

title: unable to send email messages. thunderbird keeps asking me to change password. Have made no changes to TB. Please help.
content: As of Sept 20 unable to send emails or forward emails. Thunderbird keeps asking me to change my password. Before Sept 20 there were no problems. How do I fix this problem? Thanks, Rick Arlen
creator: ricklin

title: Handbook for CSS syntax for Thunderbird 115+ ?
content: The good news: The UI of Thunderbird 115 is a nice improvement over its predecessor. The bad news: All my pre-Supernova CSS syntax in userChrome.css is broken. It would be very nice to have a handbook of CSS classes and syntax so that we could continue to be able to customize the new UI and at least get it back to the condition we had before the Supernova upgrade. I have found some good code online which has allowed me to change a few colors, but it would be nice to be able to do much more customization of this great open source software! Thanks. (For example, how can I change the colors on the compose window?)
creator: aseatanner

title: Thunderbird's Alerts Steal Focus from Full Screen Games
content:
Thunderbird recently updated from 102 to 115. Now when in games using full screen windowed mode, the new mail alert pops up over the game, where it never used to do that. If I'm in an exclusive full screen game, the alert causes the game to lose focus, which again, never happened in 102.

The calendar alerts sometimes steal focus in either full screen mode, but sometimes not. It seems entirely random. This is not new to 115, but it's still annoying. I can be in the same game, hear the notification and not lose focus. Other times, even in the same game, the notification steals the game's focus.

I checked the settings, they are the same as before. I prefer Thunderbird's notification over the system notification style, but it doesn't seem to obey the system's focus assist rules.
creator: jim.chaney

title: How to Forward with Template, if possible.
content:
After much research here, I see how I can "Reply with Template" with Message Filters. I would like to forward specific messages and add a reply from a template or other method.

Is there a way to "Forward with Template? The only option I see to do this is to create a filter and add two separate actions. This means that the recipient receives two message.

Is this possible?
